divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to the truck to get something to drink. Then I saw what appeared to be a half-deflated mylar balloon or perhaps a white garbage bag floating in the air. Suddenly it expaned into a huge white disc and began doing slow graceful movements such as circles and zig-zags. Then another identical disc appeared and they did maneuvers together. I called out to the other workers to come see the flying saucers, and immediately one of them took off and disappeared, while the other one turned on its side and appeared to change into a small plane and slowly move away. The other workers came out and saw the 'airplane' and thought I was an idiot. But I saw what I saw. Oh by the way. There was another supervisor who was with me the entire time who saw everything and reported it to others in the same way.
